name: FartHider
0:
”Alexa, open extremely fun game”
”Alexa, ask extremely fun game if I'll be rich when I grow up”
”Alexa, start extremely fun game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: extremely fun game
des:
Fart Hider is a skill where you can hide your farts. This skill is very cunning due to the fact that the answers are so much fun. Your guests or friends will never even know!

Instructions:
The person who has to fart must enable the skill and open it with the invocation name. Then your guests will be completely distracted by the skill so you can fart in the room or bathroom on time! Be sure to let me know what you think so I can improve the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
